story.storykicker: Mufti called all possible assistance from the Centre for ushering J&K into an era of peace, progress and prosperity stating that people of Jammu and Kashmir have great expectations from the present coalition government in the State.
story.storybody:
Jammu and Kashmir Chief Minister Mehbooba Mufti called for reviving the Confidence Building Measures (CBMs) to consolidate the fresh peace efforts in the State,today.

Mufti called all possible assistance from the Centre for ushering J&K into an era of peace, progress and prosperity stating that people of Jammu and Kashmir have great expectations from the present coalition government in the State.

BRING PEACE IN VALLEY

Discussing the security and developmental issues concerning the valley with Union Home Minister Rajnath Singh, Mufti asserted on the urgency of rejuvenating the CBMs in the State.

Mufti stressed on the rehabilitation of the Kashmiri youths who had gone across for arms training and are now want to return.
She also proposed for opening the Suchetgarh-Sialkote and Kargil-Skardu routes to increase people to people contact in the region.

Singh, in his response, assured Mufti of opening more cross-LoC points for movement of people and goods, while Centre will try to work out the modalities for legalising the Nepal route for return of Kashmiri youths from PoK.

HOME COMING KASHMIRI PANDITS?

During the discussion, issue of arranging transit accommodation for migrant Kashmiri Pandits was also taken up. Mufti agreed to make arrangements for accommodating the migrant Kashmiri Pandits in transit accommodation till their permanent settlement at their native places.

Mufti further called for raising additional IRPF battalions in Jammu and Kashmir to create employment opportunities for the local youth.

Rehabilitation of those affected during the devastating floods of September 2014 and reconstruction of the damaged public infrastructure projects were also discussed.
story.magazinekicker: Mufti called all possible assistance from the Centre for ushering J&K into an era of peace, progress and prosperity stating that people of Jammu and Kashmir have great expectations from the present coalition government in the State.
story.shortheadline: Mufti-Rajnath meeting: CBMs to be revived, migrant Kashmiri Pandits to get transit accommodation
